Comment.val: /*Functionality to collect VAT-transaction. In future to be replace with an tpc-post-action*/

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cl_id, tr_id, mut, to_date(bookdate,'YYYYMMDD'), ppr.ppr_id from ( select ti.trai_tr_cl_id cl_id, ti.trai_tr_re_id re_id, ti.trai_tr_volgnummer tr_id, t.tr_mut_gemaakt mut, t.tr_boekdatum bookdate from tap_tr_rel_account_info ti inner join transactions t on ti.trai_tr_volgnummer = t.tr_volgnummer where 1=1 and trai_tr_cl_id in (select coba_cl_id from contract_base b where b.vat_location like ~1) and t.tr_transnummer > 0 and t.tr_boekdatum between ~2 and ~3 and exists (select 1 from trans_calc_components tc inner join calculationrules cr on cr.cfcu_id = tc.tcc_cfcu_id inner join deduction_definition d on d.id= cr.cfcu_dedu_id where tc.tcc_tr_id = t.tr_volgnummer and tc.tcc_re_id = ti.trai_tr_re_id and cr.cfcu_dedu_id = ~4) union select v.cl_id cl_id, ti.trai_tr_re_id re_id, t.tr_volgnummer tr_id, t.tr_mut_gemaakt mut, t.tr_boekdatum bookdate from transactions t inner join transactions t2 on t2.tr_transnummer = t.tr_origtr_storno inner join vat_transaction v on v.tr_id = t2.tr_volgnummer inner join tap_tr_rel_account_info ti on ti.trai_tr_volgnummer = t.tr_volgnummer and ti.trai_tr_cl_id = v.cl_id and ti.trai_tr_account_code=2 where t.tr_boekdatum between ~2 and ~3 and t.tr_mut_gemaakt = 's') s inner join rekeningen r on r.re_id = s.re_id inner join rekeningen_per_product rp on rp.rpp_rekening_nummer = r.re_rekening and rp.rpp_relatienummer = r.re_nummer and rp.rpp_rekeningsoort = r.re_soort and rp.rpp_valuta = r.re_muntsoort inner join producten_per_relatie ppr on ppr.ppr_relatienummer = r.re_nummer and ppr.ppr_productnummer = rp.rpp_productnummer and ppr.ppr_volgnr_per_product = rp.rpp_volgnr_per_product
